casebody.data:
Supreme Court — Appellate Term, April, 1901.

Before Bisohoff, P. J., Letentritt and Clarke, JJ.

Joseph Adler, Respondent, v. The Metropolitan Street Railway Company, Appellant. Appeal from a judgment of the of the City Court, affirming a judgment in favor of the plaintiff, rendered upon the verdict of a jury. Henry A. Robinson, for appellant; Herman Fox, for respondent. Judgment affirmed, with costs.

No opinion.
